Value.label: Set to Default
Value.Help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

Value.label: Mode timeout
Value.Help: The time used in mode 2 to turn the sensor off. This Time will start running as soon as detection is seen.

Value.label: Switch off time
Value.Help: The switch off time will start running as soon as mode timeout is done. Motion sensor is turned on and when movement is detected again the mode timeout (cfg param 1) will start running all over again. When switch off time is done a basic off message is sent to the associated node.

Value.label: Sensitivity
Value.Help: Sensitivity value between 0 and 127 (values above 127 will be reported as the set value but will be handled in SW as 127).

Value.label: The mode
Value.Help: The mode that is entered after detection. If mode is 0 or higher then 3, that value will be reported after a get but will be handled in SW as mode 2.
